This is the second videogame I truly "played" the first being call of duty 4, and albeit they are in no way similar they gave me the same feeling, they are just.. Fun. 

Every class is great and different, useful in it's own way, it is a very unique game (well was until Overwatch) and with it's colorful graphics, active community, trading, items you can collect, custom maps.. I recommend everyone to play it. And you really can't find a reason not to, it's free.
it's cancer

This game has been so hyped for years I decided to check it out (yes I have played longer than 17 minutes) and I really cant figure out what all the hype was about. It's a pretty fun game but I really don't see what the big deal is. It's an average shooter, well polished, with a great class system and lovable characters, but it's not a game that's really something to be pumped about. I find a lot of Valve's games have a lot of hype behind them that I just don't undestand once I get my hands on them. I suppose you have to have played them since they came out. I recommend to fans of competitive shooters and class based action like Overwatch (yes, heavily inspired by this game), but to someone who's looking to be blown away? Meh.

such a nice game ruined by bots, cheaters and 10y olds. It's just sad to see a game like this die this way, but there is no fun when you just go in a casual game expecting to have a nice time and find bots, cheaters or some toxic kids that have 0 knowledge about the game. I really don't mind losing or winning in a casual I play it for fun but I can't enjoy a game where there are literally kids kicking people for trying to have fun and as soon as they die it's always a cheater they can't understand the fact that someone is better than them in a game and this is why I don't find this game fun anymore.

Mad respect for the actual nice players left in this game.

¿Has buscado alguna vez un hotel en Internet? ¿Has visto la cantidad de precios diferentes que hay para la misma habitación? Trivago te ayuda a comparar los precios de mas de 700 mil hoteles en mas de 175 paginas web. En vez de perder tiempo y dinero, Trivago te lo hace fácil para que encuentres tu hotel ideal al mejor precio, solo entra a trivago.com y escribe tu destino, selecciona en dos clics la fecha de llegada y salida. Así de simple, Trivago busca al instante entre cientos de paginas web y te muestra los hoteles disponibles, selecciona el precio máximo que quieres gastar, elige el numero de estrellas, o filtra por las puntuaciones de los usuarios, Trivago te muestras los diferentes precios disponibles para una misma habitación, así puedes estar seguro de encontrar tu hotel ideal al mejor precio, ¿Hotel? Trivago.
